title: Pfizer Forecasts $54 Billion in 2022 Sales From Its Covid-19 Vaccine, Treatment
sub_head: Vaccine’s success produced step change in pharmaceutical company’s revenue trend
body:
Pfizer Inc. said Tuesday that surging sales of its Covid-19 treatment and continued demand for its shots will likely boost the company’s revenue to around $100 billion this year.
The pharmaceutical company estimated that sales of Paxlovid, a pill aimed at reducing severe outcomes from the virus, will reach about $22 billion in 2022. Pfizer’s vaccine for the virus will likely add $32 billion in revenue, Pfizer said, an increase from Pfizer’s most recent guidance.
